edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.actions
Class AssociateAlternative

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.ui.actions.ActionDelegate
      edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.actions.AssociateAlternative
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.ui.IActionDelegate, org.eclipse.ui.IActionDelegate2, org.eclipse.ui.IViewActionDelegate
public class AssociateAlternative
extends org.eclipse.ui.actions.ActionDelegate
implements org.eclipse.ui.IViewActionDelegate

This class is used to associate an alternative with the Java code that implements it. This is invoked using an extension to the popup menus on the package explorer. The extension is defined in plugin.xml

Author:
wangw2

selectionChanged

public void selectionChanged(org.eclipse.jface.action.IAction action,
                             org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelection selection)
Detects when the selected item has changed. In this case, the selected item refers to the java element in the package explorer.

Specified by:
selectionChanged in interface org.eclipse.ui.IActionDelegate
Overrides:
selectionChanged in class org.eclipse.ui.actions.ActionDelegate

run

public void run(org.eclipse.jface.action.IAction action)
Executes the action. We get the selected java element and use it to create a rationale update event to kick off the association (we need to somehow get from the code to the rationale tree so we know what rationale element we are associating with!

Specified by:
